info.title: In Ufah, they'll set up a trolleybus company with IPA.
In Bashkiria, it was proposed to increase fines for crossings.
Bashkiria and Belarus will agree on the release of trolleybuses and batteries.
In Bashkiria, it was proposed to build a heating cat factory for ительных180 million
In Bashkiria, two criminal cases of sabotage have been brought in per year.

Mintransu Bashkiria ordered the interruption of the contract with the Evacuator company
The Supreme Court of Bashkiria left Ruslan Kazyhanov in detention
The land under Ufah most often pollutes petroleum products and poultry waste
Bashkiria proposes to introduce compulsory state insurance for fish inspectors
Average nominal wages in Bashkiria increased by 15 per cent per year
The inventory value of capital facilities in Bashkiria increased by 26 per cent
